parameters.name: NewDescription
parameters.description:
The new description.

>  You must specify at least one of the `NewDescription` and `NewEncodedSAMLMetadataDocument` parameters.

parameters.name: NewEncodedSAMLMetadataDocument
parameters.description:
The new metadata file.

>  You must specify at least one of the `NewDescription` and `NewEncodedSAMLMetadataDocument` parameters.

parameters.name: SAMLProviderName
parameters.description: The name of the IdP whose information you want to modify.
